https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add one or several globally unique and persistent digital identifier for this person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/email._instruction: Enter the email address of this person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/email.description: Address to which or from which an electronic mail can be sent.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/email.label: Email
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/email.name: email

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/famil._instruction: Enter the family name of this person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/famil.description: Name borne in common by members of a family.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/famil.label: Family name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/famil.name: familyName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/given._instruction: Enter the given name of this person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/given.description: Name given to a person, including all potential middle names, but excluding the family name.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/given.label: Given name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/given.name: givenName
